content:
Sure, here's a table that shows the 16 geomancy figures in a vertical presentation, with their symbols represented by 8 circles or squares, and their descriptions and interpretations in separate columns:

| Geomancy Figure | Symbol | Description | Interpretation |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| Cape Verde | ○○○○○○○○ | Complete change, death, or transformation | A major change or transformation is about to occur |
| Chameleon | ◻◻◻◻○○○○ | Adaptation, disguise, or deception | One must be flexible and adaptable to navigate the situation |
| Crab | ◻○○○○○○◻ | Retreat, hiding, or seclusion | The best course of action is to withdraw and take time for reflection |
| Crocodile | ○○○○○○○◻ | Danger, aggression, or attack | Beware of threats or aggression from others |
| Elephant | ○○○○○○◻◻ | Strength, endurance, or power | The situation requires resilience, strength, and fortitude |
| Gazelle | ◻◻○○○○○◻ | Speed, agility, or grace | Quick action and nimble thinking will be necessary |
| Goat | ◻○○○○○◻◻ | Fertility, sensuality, or abundance | A time of prosperity and abundance |
